snippet: The American Mavericks music festival, with the San Francisco Symphony as its centerpiece, featured fresh, powerful and energetic programs of chamber-scale works at Zankel Hall.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews concert of chamber-scale works performed by the San Francisco Symphony at Zankel Hall as part of the American Mavericks music festival.
lead_paragraph: The American Mavericks music festival, with the San Francisco Symphony as its centerpiece, featured fresh, powerful and energetic programs of chamber-scale works at Zankel Hall.

headline.seo: American Mavericks, with San Francisco Symphony, at Zankel
